languages.text: {n}Приглашенные проповедники, суровые и строгие, принялись посменно читать в вокс-передатчик грозную литанию о неминуемой победе Императора. Гневные слова их летели прямо в Имматериум, звучали в ушах населяющих его духов, и негде им было укрыться от сей праведной речи. Когда кто-то из пастырей умирал, его место занимал новый, и конца добровольцам не было.{/n}

{n}The invited preachers, strict and stern, started to take shifts reciting a formidable litany about the inevitable victory of the Emperor into the vox-caster. Their angry words flew straight into the Immaterium, reverberated in the ears of the spirits that inhabited it, unable to hide from this righteous diatribe. Whenever one of the preachers perished, another would take their place, and there was no shortage of volunteers.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Приглашенные проповедники, суровые и строгие, принялись посменно читать в вокс-передатчик грозную литанию о неминуемой победе Императора. Гневные слова их летели прямо в Имматериум, звучали в ушах населяющих его духов, и негде им было укрыться от сей праведной речи. Когда кто-то из пастырей умирал, его место занимал новый, и конца добровольцам не было.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The invited preachers, strict and stern, have started to recite in shifts the formidable litany about the inevitable victory of the Emperor into the Vox-caster. Their angry words flew straight into the Immaterium, reverberated in the ears of the spirits that inhabited it, who could not hide from this righteous speech. If one of the preachers would die,another one would take his place, and there was no shortage of the volunteers.{/n}

If one of the preachers would die,another one would take his place, and there was no shortage of the volunteers.{/n}

languages.text: {n}严厉而坚定的布道士被邀请而来。他们通过通讯器轮流背诵令人生畏的祷文，宣扬帝皇必将到来的光荣胜利。他们愤怒的祷告直接传入了亚空间之中，回荡在盘踞其中的幽灵耳中。那些恶灵无从躲避正义的怒火。每当一名布道士不幸牺牲，另一名布道士就会接替死者的位置，愿为正义献身的志愿者源源不绝。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The invited preachers, strict and stern, started to take shifts reciting a formidable litany about the inevitable victory of the Emperor into the vox-caster. Their angry words flew straight into the Immaterium, reverberated in the ears of the spirits that inhabited it, unable to hide from this righteous diatribe. Whenever one of the preachers perished, another would take their place, and there was no shortage of volunteers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}严厉而坚定的布道士被邀请而来。他们通过通讯器轮流背诵令人生畏的祷文，宣扬帝皇必将到来的光荣胜利。他们愤怒的祷告直接传入了亚空间之中，回荡在盘踞其中的幽灵耳中。那些恶灵无从躲避正义的怒火。每当一名布道士不幸牺牲，另一名布道士就会接替死者的位置，愿为正义献身的志愿者源源不绝。{/n}
{n}严厉而坚定的布道士被邀请而来。他们通过通讯器轮流背诵令人生畏的祷文，宣扬帝皇必将到来的光荣胜利。他们愤怒的祷告直接传入了亚空间之中，回荡在盘踞其中的幽灵耳中。那些恶灵无从躲避正义的怒火，每当一名布道士不幸牺牲，另一名布道士就会接替他的位置，愿为正义献身的志愿者源源不绝。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los predicadores invitados, estrictos y severos, empezaron a turnarse para recitar una formidable letanía sobre la inevitable victoria del Emperador a través del voco amplificador. Sus airadas palabras volaban directas al Inmaterio y atronaban los oídos de los espíritus que lo habitaban, incapaces de ocultarse de su justa diatriba. Cada vez que uno de los predicadores moría, otro ocupaba su lugar, y no faltaban voluntarios.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The invited preachers, strict and stern, started to take shifts reciting a formidable litany about the inevitable victory of the Emperor into the vox-caster. Their angry words flew straight into the Immaterium, reverberated in the ears of the spirits that inhabited it, unable to hide from this righteous diatribe. Whenever one of the preachers perished, another would take their place, and there was no shortage of volunteers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los predicadores invitados, estrictos y severos, empezaron a turnarse para recitar una formidable letanía sobre la inevitable victoria del Emperador a través del voco amplificador. Sus airadas palabras volaban directas al Inmaterio y atronaban los oídos de los espíritus que lo habitaban, incapaces de ocultarse de su justa diatriba. Cada vez que uno de los predicadores moría, otro ocupaba su lugar, y no faltaban voluntarios.{/n}

languages.text: {n}招かれたプリーチャーは厳格な態度で、交代しながら皇帝の勝利について、恐るべき連祷を音声通信送受信装置に唱え始めた。彼らの怒りの言葉はまっすぐ非物質世界に届き、そこに住む精霊たちの耳に響き、この正義の痛烈な非難から逃れることはできなかった。プリーチャーの一人死ねば、別のプリーチャーが代わりになり、そして、その志願者には事欠かなかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The invited preachers, strict and stern, started to take shifts reciting a formidable litany about the inevitable victory of the Emperor into the vox-caster. Their angry words flew straight into the Immaterium, reverberated in the ears of the spirits that inhabited it, unable to hide from this righteous diatribe. Whenever one of the preachers perished, another would take their place, and there was no shortage of volunteers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}招かれたプリーチャーは厳格な態度で、交代しながら皇帝の勝利について、恐るべき連祷を音声通信送受信装置に唱え始めた。彼らの怒りの言葉はまっすぐ非物質世界に届き、そこに住む精霊たちの耳に響き、この正義の痛烈な非難から逃れることはできなかった。プリーチャーの一人死ねば、別のプリーチャーが代わりになり、そして、その志願者には事欠かなかった。{/n}
{n}招かれたプリーチャーは厳格な態度で、交代しながら皇帝の勝利について、恐るべき連祷を音声通信送受信装置に唱え始めた。彼らの怒りの言葉はまっすぐ非物質世界に届き、そこに住む精霊たちの耳に響き、この正義の痛烈な非難から逃れることはできなかった。プリーチャーの一人死ねば、別のプリーチャーが代わりになり、そして、その志願者には事欠かなかった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les prêcheurs conviés, stricts et sévères, commencent à se relayer devant l'émetteur-vox pour clamer, dans une implacable litanie, le triomphe inévitable de l'Empereur. Leurs diatribes fiévreuses fendent l'Immaterium de part en part, se répercutant aux oreilles des esprits qui s'y terrent, incapables d'échapper à la parole des justes. Si l'un des dévots vient à périr à son poste, un autre prend sa place immédiatement, et les volontaires ne manquent pas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The invited preachers, strict and stern, started to take shifts reciting a formidable litany about the inevitable victory of the Emperor into the vox-caster. Their angry words flew straight into the Immaterium, reverberated in the ears of the spirits that inhabited it, unable to hide from this righteous diatribe. Whenever one of the preachers perished, another would take their place, and there was no shortage of volunteers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les prêcheurs conviés, stricts et sévères, commencent à se relayer devant l'émetteur-vox pour clamer, dans une implacable litanie, le triomphe inévitable de l'Empereur. Leurs diatribes fiévreuses fendent l'Immaterium de part en part, se répercutant aux oreilles des esprits qui s'y terrent, incapables d'échapper à la parole des justes. Si l'un des dévots vient à périr à son poste, un autre prend sa place immédiatement, et les volontaires ne manquent pas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die eingeladenen Prediger, streng und gläubig, fingen an, dem Vox-Transmitter in Schichten eine formidable Litanei vom unvermeidlichen Sieg des Imperators vorzutragen. Ihre zornigen Worte flogen direkt in das Immaterium und hallten in den Ohren der dortigen Geister wider, die sich nicht vor dieser rechtschaffenen Tirade verstecken konnten. Wenn einer der Prediger starb, nahm ein anderer seinen Platz ein, und es gab keinen Mangel an Freiwilligen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The invited preachers, strict and stern, started to take shifts reciting a formidable litany about the inevitable victory of the Emperor into the vox-caster. Their angry words flew straight into the Immaterium, reverberated in the ears of the spirits that inhabited it, unable to hide from this righteous diatribe. Whenever one of the preachers perished, another would take their place, and there was no shortage of volunteers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die eingeladenen Prediger, streng und gläubig, fingen an, dem Vox-Transmitter in Schichten eine formidable Litanei vom unvermeidlichen Sieg des Imperators vorzutragen. Ihre zornigen Worte flogen direkt in das Immaterium und hallten in den Ohren der dortigen Geister wider, die sich nicht vor dieser rechtschaffenen Tirade verstecken konnten. Wenn einer der Prediger starb, nahm ein anderer seinen Platz ein, und es gab keinen Mangel an Freiwilligen.{/n}

{n}Die eingeladenen Prediger, streng und gläubig, haben begonnen, dem Vox-Transmitter in Schichten eine formidable Litanei vom unvermeidlichen Sieg des Imperators vorzutragen. Ihre zornigen Worte flogen geradewegs ins Immaterium und hallten in den Ohren der dort hausenden Geister wider, die sich nicht vor dieser rechtschaffenen Tirade verstecken konnten. Wenn einer der Prediger starb, nahm ein anderer seinen Platz ein, und es gab keinen Mangel an Freiwilligen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Davete icabet eden katı ve sert vaizler, sırayla voksyayardan İmparator'un kaçınılmaz zaferiyle ilgili takdire şayan bir ilahi okumaya başladı. Öfke dolu sözleri, Tindiyar'a akarak bu haklı hicvi oradaki her bir ruha duyurdu. Vaizlerden biri öldüğünde yerini bir başkası aldı. Gönüllülerse saymakla bitmiyordu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The invited preachers, strict and stern, started to take shifts reciting a formidable litany about the inevitable victory of the Emperor into the vox-caster. Their angry words flew straight into the Immaterium, reverberated in the ears of the spirits that inhabited it, unable to hide from this righteous diatribe. Whenever one of the preachers perished, another would take their place, and there was no shortage of volunteers.{/n}
